title: WildFly 24.0.1 S2I images have been released on quay.io
content: WILDFLY 24.0.1 S2I DOCKER IMAGES  The WildFly S2I (Source-to-Image) builder and runtime Docker images for WildFly 24.0.1, have been released on .  For complete documentation on how to use these images using S2I, OpenShift and Docker, refer to the WildFly S2I .   HELM CHART FOR WILDFLY  The has been updated to use the WildFly S2I 24.0.1 images.  The is a good place to start using the Helm Chart with the WildFly S2I images.  Enjoy!
